attributes.contentHtml:
Ok so I found a host recently call VBN Host.
So This guy called Bossy Boy the developer of the host was promoting it and I asked him couple of questions.
So the owner is this guy

and the developer is this guy

They really think I'm stupid I ain't gonna explain cuz you can read it by yourself so long story short this guy claims that they did Carding and earn a lot of bucks from it.They are doing it from 4 years. Their website dosen't even work and plus they think I'll believe in their 100 cores node lmfao. And I was banned for no reason. And at least when he realised that he has been exposed he started emotional stuff saying now do you hate me and stuff.




They have no rules no tos and no priv policy.
No node stats no uptime. And their plans are super sketchy. Server for invites?

And can't even talk about their donator plans
60$ for 45GB? Dude u can get a 64GB hetzner dedi and 2 64GB contabo dedi for that price

Link to their Discord Server:- https://discord.gg/VAbBKp4rss

attributes.title: VBN Hosting - Not TOS & PP | Carding | Illegal Activity
